status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across this 6‑hour window the turbine spent all 37 ten‑minute intervals in **Downtime**, with **near‑zero power** output (power_mean −0.0042, very low variability). Ambient conditions were generally **low wind** on average (2.68 m/s) with intermittent higher gusts (max 10 m/s), but there was no corresponding production response; pitch remained very high on average (~88°) and yaw misalignment averaged ~29°. Residual power was slightly positive (0.0038) while temperatures were stable around ~30°C, and rotor/generator speed variability was limited to modest fluctuations.
